import "./App.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import {getAll, update} from './BooksAPI'; import CurrentlyReading from "./components/CurrentlyReading"; import WantRead from "./components/WantRead"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const store = { searchBooks: [], Books: [] } useEffect(() => { const allBooks = async () => { const res = await getAll(); store.Books.push(res); console.log(store.Books) } allBooks(); }); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    {/* CurrentlyReading component */} {/* WantRead component */}

    Read

    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
